# Configuration

This document explains configuration options for DocBuilder.

## Repository Configuration

```yaml
repositories:
  - name: docs
    url: https://github.com/example/docs
    branch: main
    paths: ["docs"]
```

## Hugo Configuration

DocBuilder generates Hugo sites with appropriate themes.

- Start with [Getting Started](./getting-started.md)
- Explore the [API Guide](./api-guide.md) for integration
